lead_paragraph: Mercedes flew parts in by private jet from Britain overnight to keep Formula One world champion Lewis Hamilton on Sunday's Russian Grand Prix starting grid after engine problems in qualifying.

headline.print_headline: Hamilton Escapes Grid Drop After Parts Flown In
headline.main: Hamilton Escapes Grid Drop After Parts Flown In

snippet: Mercedes flew parts in by private jet from Britain overnight to keep Formula One world champion Lewis Hamilton on Sunday's Russian Grand Prix starting grid after engine problems in qualifying....
